trends: There have been no other sightings in Doerun
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was sitting on my back porch about 9:15 p.m. on the 8th or 9th of jan. 2008 with my wife. we had finished cooking on the grill. my wife took the food inside and when she came back out she asked "what is that". she point up in the s.e. sky and i did not see anything. she said it was just there. then we saw a bight off white\yellow light. i thought it was the landing lights of a plane. but then the light went out. about 1-2 secs. in apperared again only higher in the sky. it went out again about the same amout of time and reappeared higher and more east. then it went out, about the same amount of time and reapperared lower in the sky. it did this at least two more times until we lost sight of it behind the tree line. the light when on stayed 1-2 secs. each time and it stayed the same brightness every time. we were both, wow what was that.
Summary: flash of light moving in sky.
